title: Examples and counterexamples for magmas, semigroups and monoids (extension)

blocks.name: opmpt2ismgm
blocks.content: A structure with a group addition operation in maps-to notation is a magma if the operation value is contained in the base set. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm opmpt2ismgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmgm))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmgm)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c1))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, wcel(c2, c1))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  ovmpt2elrn(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2, c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wne(c1, emptycls))
  sylbi(wne(c1, emptycls), wb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1)))), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  n0(hs2, c1)
  exlimiv(hs2, wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  ismgmn0(hs0, hs1, cv(hs2), c1, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  eqcomi(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.w(wb(wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), c1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm opmpt2ismgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ Mgm)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (+ ` c0)=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈ Mgm), d(s0, c0))
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈ Mgm, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1)))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, (hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)), (hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1)), hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1)))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, c2 ∈ c1)
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1)
  ovmpt2elrn(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2, c1, hs0, hs1, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ Mgm ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1))), c1 ≠ ∅)
  sylbi(c1 ≠ ∅, (c0 ∈ Mgm ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1))), ∃(hs2, hs2 ∈ c1))
  n0(hs2, c1)
  exlimiv(hs2, hs2 ∈ c1, (c0 ∈ Mgm ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  ismgmn0(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqcomi((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.w((c0 ∈ Mgm ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
}

blocks.name: copissgrp
blocks.content: A structure with a constant group addition operation is a semigroup if the constant is contained in the base set. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm copissgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csgrp))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, csgrp), wcel(c0, cmgm), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wral(hs2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2))))))))
  opmpt2ismgm(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
  ralrimivvva(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c1, c1, w0, wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)))))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2))), co(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), c2), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  sylan(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wceq(co(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), c2)), wcel(c2, c1))
  eqtr4d(co(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), c2), c2, wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2), c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))))
  simpr3(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), c2, c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wa(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))))
  simpr1(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  simpl(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2), c2, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs1), c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)))))
  simpr1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2)), c2, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, cv(hs1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cv(hs2), c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))))
  eqidd(c2, wa(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs2)))))
  simpr2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  simpr3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
  issgrp(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  eqcomi(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1)))
  diff.w3a.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

}

thm copissgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ SGrp)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (+ ` c0)=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ SGrp, c0 ∈ Mgm, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,((hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2)=(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)](hs1[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2))))))
  opmpt2ismgm(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  adantr(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ c1)
  ralrimivvva(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c1, c1, w0, ((hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2)=(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)](hs1[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2)))
  3eqtr4d(((hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1)[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2), (hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)](hs1[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2)), (c2[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2), (hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]c2), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  sylan(w0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1), (c2[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2)=(hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]c2), c2 ∈ c1)
  eqtr4d((c2[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs2), (hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]c2), c2, (c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, c2, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), hs2, c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, (c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  eqidd(c2, ((c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))∧(s0 = c2 ∧ s1 = hs2)))
  simpr3(c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ c1)
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, hs0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), c2, c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, (c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  eqidd((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  eqidd(c2, ((c2 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))∧(s0 = hs0 ∧ s1 = c2)))
  simpr1(c2 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, hs2 ∈ c1)
  simpl(c2 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))
  oveq1d((hs0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)]hs1), (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), hs2, c2, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  ovmpt2d(s0, s1, hs0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), hs1, c2, c1, c1, c2, c1, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1)))
  eqidd(c2, ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈ c1))∧(s0 = hs0 ∧ s1 = hs1)))

blocks.name: oddinmgm
